Message: Don't let discomfort deter your drive, my trainee. Physical ailments often fade amidst the surge of determination. Let's focus on form and pace ourselves wisely, pushing only when you sense true improvement within.
I don't want to train with you!

Your momentary reluctance only highlights the need for this growth more acutely. Remember, pain is temporary, progress everlasting. The fire inside may be dim, but I'll fan the flames until they roar once more.
I want to hang out with my friends.

Friends uplift our spirits, yet what better way to celebrate camaraderie than by overcoming personal challenges? Embrace the struggle now, and revel in shared triumph later. I'm here to make certain that victory tastes even sweeter.
